attributes.action: Allow gyms to remain open throughout the November 2020 4wk lock down period.
attributes.additional_details:
Evidence of Covid being contracted in gyms is negligible to extremely low.
Gyms provide health and mental stability to people.
Gyms are safe & ensure a good standard of human release.
Without gyms, people's mental health & body will suffer as a consequence.
attributes.background: All gyms to remain open during 4 week lock down period.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
